sentences.sContent: He described the scene to me.
sentences.sCn: 他向我描述了那个情景。

sentences.sContent: He telegraphed me to go to the party.
sentences.sContent_eng: He telegraphed me to go to the party.
sentences.sCn: 他发电报要我去参加那个聚会。

sentences.sContent: The world exists, whether you like it or not.
sentences.sContent_eng: The world exists, whether you like it or not.
sentences.sCn: 不管你喜欢与否，这个世界照样存在。

trans.tranCn: 更加（用于比较级，最高级前）
trans.tranOther: used before two  comparative  adjectives or adverbs to show that the degree of one event or situation is related to the degree of another one
